page.title: 12LEISURE & RECREATION 1
page.content: Dunstable Park Recreation Centre is one of the largest centres in the country and is used by approximately 1 million people a year who travel there from miles around.Our survey showed that women between 25_35 use the centre more frequently during the day and men between 16_25 during the evening.Swimming was found to be the most popular activity followed by squash. In the winter however bowls takes second place for popularity.The park area is lawn, shrubs, herbaceous plants and formal bedding. Surrounded by the town,there are many trees both broadleaved and conifers. Invertebrates,birds,amphibians and small mammals live there.People relax in the park using the tennis courts,swings and benches.Vandalism, litter and glass are problems.Grove House are the council offices.
